txt.en:
'I cannot believe you got those Corsairs to leave! It is amazing, [placeholder].

'I hope people come back soon. The Corsairs were good for business, but I would rather have peace and quiet any day.

'Calembel is not far from here. I would imagine the townsfolk went there, if they're smart.'
You should go to Calembel and see if any refugees from Lothgobel have made their way there.
Calembel is south of Lothgobel in Lamedon.\n\nYou should make your way to Calembel.

'Hail, traveller. Did you escape Lothgobel as well? As you see we have many folk here who came from that town.'

You explain that Jajax and the Corsairs have left Lothgobel, and a truce has been reached.

'Oh! Well, that is great news, and unexpected, for we have not the soldiers to keep the enemy at bay.'
